quote: Every human is not born with the extraordinary capacity to accept himself unconditionally, the kind of acceptance that helps him to survive when the whole world stands in opposition.~ Aarush Kashyap
quote_letters: EVERY HUMAN IS NOT BORN WITH THE EXTRAORDINARY CAPACITY TO ACCEPT HIMSELF UNCONDITIONALLY THE KIND OF ACCEPTANCE THAT HELPS HIM TO SURVIVE WHEN THE WHOLE WORLD STANDS IN OPPOSITION AARUSH KASHYAP
